opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Scheidler v. National Organization for Women, Inc.

opinion:
537 U.S. 808

SCHEIDLER ET AL.
v.
NATIONAL ORGANIZATION FOR WOMEN, INC., ET AL.

No. 01-1118.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 7, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE SEVENTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 7th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 535 U.S. 1016.] Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
